workzen.xgen.util
Class DateUtil

java.lang.Object
  workzen.xgen.util.DateUtil

public class DateUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This class converts date "strings" into Date objects. It takes standard sql date - time - timestamp formats as input.

Author:
Brad Matlack

Constructor Detail

DateUtil

Method Detail

getDate

public static java.util.Date getDate(java.lang.String val)
This Date class provides a string wrapper for all three sql types: java.sql.Date, java.sql.Time and java.sql.Timestamp Three types of string formats are allowed:
  • year-month-day "2001-05-20"
  • hour:min:sec "01:01:01"
  • year-month-day hour:min:sec "2001-05-20 01:01:01"

    • If "2001:05:20 01:01:01" is passed in, year, month and day = 0

    Date will be set to current time if val = ""

    Parameters:
    String - date formatted string

    formatTimestamp

    Parameters:
    text - The CSV list of values to split apart.
    pos - The piece of the array
